Name: Bouteiller
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Herbal and delicately spiced rum invigorated, aerated, and harmonised by shaking.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Alissa Gabriel at Manhattan Line in Brisbane. This was the Australian Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail. Alissa says, " The history of Bacardí is famous, but very few have heard the story of Jose Leon Bouteiller and his contributions to Bacardí. The Bouteiller cocktail flavors work hand in hand, just like Bacardí and Jose Leon. "
Nutrition: One serving of Bouteiller contains 142 calories
